mapper.select: select a.id id, a.tenant_id tenant_id, a.account account, a.nick_name nick_name, a.phone phone, a.status status, a.del_flag del_flag, a.create_time create_time, a.update_time, t.id tenant_id, t.code tenant_code, t.tenant_name tenant_name from admin a left join tenant t on a.tenant_id = t.id where a.account = #{account} and a.password = #{password} and t.code = #{tenant_code}
